###User Defined Function###
_GUICtrlMenu_GetMenuInfo

###Description###
Retrieves information about a specified menu

###Syntax###
#Include <GuiMenu.au3>
_GUICtrlMenu_GetMenuInfo($hMenu)

###Parameters###
@@ParamTable@@
$hMenu
	Handle of the menu
@@End@@

###ReturnValue###
Success: $tagMENUINFO structure

###Remarks###
None.
